Source Control¶

Repositories¶

Naming convention is kebab case. E.g: some-repository.

Repositories:

  • nseed: Engine, Tool

  • nseed-visual-studio-task-runner

  • nseed-examples

  • nseed.io: Website

Repository Structure¶

For code repositories:

[benchmarks]
  [FirstBenchmark]
  [SecondBenchmark]
[build]
  [private]
    [NukeBuild]
[docs]
[images]
[lab]
  [FirstExperiment]
  [SecondExperiment]
[licenses]
[output]
[src]
[tests]
  [acceptance]
  [integration]
  [smoke]
    [FirstConcreteSmokeTest]
    [SecondConcreteSmokeTest]
  [stress]

Each folder has README.md.

Commits¶

We use Commitizen. We do not have components.

We use two additional types:

  • lab - For lab experiments.

  • perf - For performance improvements.

We have linear history (rebase before merge).
